items.description: Understand the problem before writing a single line. My code is a consequence, not a starting point.
Every choice has a future impact. I work with maintenance and longevity in mind.
Complexity only when necessary. No technical showboating here.
Security and stability are not optional in my work. Quality is a standard, not a differentiator.
